text: All on Account of the Milk is a 1910 American silent comedy movie directed by Frank Powell and stars Mary Pickford, Kate Bruce, and Blanche Sweet. ==Actors== * Mary Pickford as The Young Woman * Kate Bruce as The Young Woman's Mother * Blanche Sweet as The Maid * Mack Sennett as The Farmhand * Arthur V. Johnson as The Young Contractor * Flora Finch * Jack Pickford as At Construction Site ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Powell
title: All on Account of the Milk
